q: `` In the next two or three years we will be able to see a single entity. It could be based here in the United States,'' Corriere della Sera quoted Sergio Marchionne as saying. We'll have to integrate the companies first, though, and then look at the management, he added. Labour Ministry on Saturday published a statement showing the Fiat chief backing away from his previous remarks in a telephone conversation with labour minister Maurizio Sacconi . Factor is well supported on both sides of the border.`` I know from my experience of the Young Star Search there is no shortage of talent in Northern Ireland,'' he said. There will potentially be no representation from Ireland, north or south, which is a bit rich given how loyal people here are to the show. Simon Cowell has made no secret of the fact that he was underwhelmed by what Dublin had to offer- and it is believed to be under his orders that X Factor has axed the Irish leg.

Microsoft's Server and Tools Business- in many ways the epicentre of its cloud strategy- is primed to undergo a shakeup this year with the departure of long-time division president Bob Muglia . While Windows and Office are household words, our Server and Tools business has quietly and steadily grown to be the unquestioned leader in server computing, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer title="Bob Muglia-quits-microsoft-as-brain-drain-continues" href="http://www.eweekeurope.co.uk/news/Bob Muglia-quits-microsoft-as-brain-drain-continues-17745" target="_self"> wrote in a January 10 email to employees announcing Bob Muglia 's removal.`` We are now ready to build on our success and move forward into the era of cloud computing
